entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Varennes

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 2.
